title: Ask HN: What lessons did you learn from your best or worst colleagues?
author: typeofnandev
story_text: I have a theory that you learn lessons from all your colleagues--best, worst, and everything in between. Interested to hear what lessons you feel are worth sharing.

title.value: Ask HN: What lessons did you learn from your best or worst colleagues?
